item.description:
[see above for meeting location]

“There are known knowns; there are things we know we know. We also know there are known unknowns; that is to say we know there are some things we do not know. But there are also unknown unknowns – the ones we don't know we don't know.” —Former United States Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld

 

It is time to prepare for the worst case of unknown unknowns!     

 

ZOMBIES!

From Theories of International Politics and Zombies:

1) Zombies require human flesh; they will not eat other zombies.

2) Zombies can not be killed unless their brain is destroyed.

3) Any human being bitten by a zombie will inevitably become a zombie.

 

Are you prepared for zombies?  How will you survive if you aren't prepared? What are best weapons?  What to do if someone you know gets bitten by one of the undead?

 

How will nations deal the threat?  Can they react quick enough? Would civilization collapse?  How will various various political groups & institutions react to a zombie invasion?    How will the neocons, liberals, realists approach the crisis?   What are the issues with dealing with slow zombies vs fast zombies?

 

 

 

We will rely on the latest scholarly analysis on zombies and international politics.  Professor Daniel W. Drezner, has written Theories of International Politics and Zombies .   Drezner is both a member of the Council on Foreign Relations, and the Zombie Research Society.

 

 

 

We'll also draw on other authoritative sources as Max Brook's  The Zombie Survival Guide: Complete Protection from the Living Dead and Brook's  World War Z: An Oral History of the Zombie War.

 

Some of our survival lessons will come from the tragic zombie documentary: Shaun of the Dead.

 

This event will be both discussion international politics,  as well as a hands on zombie survival guide.  

 

Don't be dinner for the invasion of flesh eating ghouls.  Prepare! Survive!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us upstairs in the glass conference room, (Lucia Mastrangelo).
item.why: Because our very survival depends on it! Really!
item.name: International Politics and Zombies!
